pt.uminho.anote2.process.IR
Interface IIRSearch

All Superinterfaces:
IIRProcess, IProcess
All Known Implementing Classes:
PubMedSearch, PubMedSearchExtension, PubMedSearchExtensionUpdate
public interface IIRSearch
extends IIRProcess

This interface implements a Information retrieval process that search in online library archives detailed information for scientific articles

Version:
1.0 ( 17 junho 2009)
Author:
Hugo Costa
